dlc: RPG Maker VX Ace - NPC Male Villagers Vol.2

Fill your towns and villages with happy greetings and quest-starting cries with NPC Male Villagers Vol.2! TK. Projects is here with another enormous voice pack with 120 Japanese voice SEs to help you flesh out more of your NPCs and characters. Give your villages’ cheerful boys happy shouts of hello the local merchant a depressed sigh when his shipment doesn’t come in and the grouchy old nobleman an angry screech if your heroes enter his house!    Features:     120 different phrases and sayings   10 SE per character   ogg and m4a file formats included    Terms of Use:     This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.   OK to be used in Commercial projects   Contents can be edited   OK for use in games with gore   OK for use in adult-rated games
